tagline.en: Using our technical super-powers to add value to the EOS community!
tagline.zh: 利用我们的技术技能来帮助他人并为EOS社区增添价值

introduce.en: Our mission is to translate our knowledge and skills into a positive and dependable platform while helping the EOS community achieve great things through thoughtful action.
introduce.zh: 我们的使命是将我们的知识和技能转化为积极和可靠的平台，同时通过深思熟虑的行动帮助EOS社区实现伟大的事业。

org.name: SaltBlock
org.location: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States of America
